duties_responsibilities.duty: Overseeing QA activities related to GCP and ensuring compliance with regulations and guidelines
Management of GCP QA audit initiatives and quality systems
Establishing, sustaining, and validating the efficacy of quality programs and documentation to affirm GCP compliance
Direct reporting to the Vice President of Quality
Offering insight and direction on GCP compliance to stakeholders
Ensuring proper and timely escalation of quality matters and potential misconduct in projects/products
Participating in refining/enhancing QA GCP procedures, guiding documents, and audit resources

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in a scientific field or equivalent qualification, Minimum of 10 years of experience in a Quality-related role, 8 years of prior managerial experience
